about_the_game:
This is a dating simulation game/visual novel set in Japan where you can date real Japanese female gamers.
Through dates, you can learn about each character's actual life experiences and hardships, getting to know them deeply.
All of them share the common trait of being gamers, so you, who love games, will surely have lively conversations with them.

There are three characters: "The developer of this game," "A beautiful game streamer," and "A pregnant manga assistant (no romance element)."
There are billions of people in the world, but each person's life is different, and everyone has their own unique personality.
This game focuses on slightly unusual real individuals, providing an experience that delves deep into each person.

Game System

This game is fully voiced in Japanese.
If you make a wrong choice in the two-choice options, you'll reach a humorous bad ending.
There are many bad endings, and comic elements are incorporated.
Each character has one linear story for their ending.

Trophies

You can earn trophies by seeing bad endings and happy endings.
When you see all the endings for each character, you unlock that character's still images.

Character [Bell (CV : Bell)]

A game programmer from a major game company.
For some reason, she had to create this game.
She has experience studying English in the Philippines and doing a working holiday in Australia, during which she was once kidnapped.
In her teens, she experienced intense suffering.

Character [Kin-chan (CV : Yasuna Konno)]

A very beautiful game streamer who loves shooting games.
She has a laid-back and selfish personality.
Her screams during gameplay are so intense that viewers' eardrums nearly burst.
While everything seems to be going well for her, she experienced many hardships during her student days.

Character [Casey (CV : Eri Uta)]

An assistant to a super-famous manga artist.
Currently pregnant with her second child, she's aiming to become a manga artist while raising children.
There's no romance element; through friendly outings, she passionately talks about fertility treatments, childbirth, and balancing childcare with gaming.
She has working holiday experience in Australia and has worked in agriculture and dairy farming, which she found challenging.

highlighted.name: 菌ちゃんエンディング１

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes a storyline where a character was kidnapped in the past. There is also some mild violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (Sp1+), Windows10, Windows11
  • Processor: x86, x64 processors that support SSE2 instruction set.
  • Graphics: Supports DirectX 10, 11, 12.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
